indexes.indexdef: CREATE INDEX "Templates_category_intent_tone_status_idx" ON public."Templates" USING btree (category, intent, tone, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "Templates_pkey" ON public."Templates" USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uq_templates_approved_unique ON public."Templates" USING btree (category, intent, tone) WHERE (status = 'approved'::text)
